Welcome to FinEdge.-

At FinEdge, we believe that financial success is within reach for everyone. We are a trusted financial advisory firm dedicated to helping individuals and businesses achieve their financial goals, navigate market complexities, and make informed investment decisions. With our expertise and personalized approach, we strive to empower our clients to build a secure and prosperous financial future.

About Me

About Us

Our Story

One day, a small manufacturing company, struggling to stay afloat amidst a severe downturn in their industry, approached FinEdge for assistance. The company's profits had dwindled, debts had piled up, and morale among employees was at an all-time low. Desperate to turn their fortunes around, they reached out to FinEdge in search of a lifeline.

Know more -

Harsh Gahlaut Co-Founder & CEO

Harsh Co-founded FinEdge after successfully managing several large businesses in the Financial Services Industry. He is a Management Graduate from Symbiosis (Pune) and has worked with institutions like Xerox (Key Accounts Manager), Standard Chartered Bank (Regional Head - Capital Markets), Dawnay Day AV (Country Head - Wealth Management) & Religare Macquarie (Senior Vice President - Private Banking) over the last 21 years.

Mayank Bhatnagar Co-Founder & COO

Mayank co-founded FinEdge and is a management graduate with a professional experience of more than 20 years, across retail and corporate banking. His expertise in global transaction banking and retail assets in Standard Chartered Bank has been critical in setting up the FinEdge business intelligence platform.

Aniruddha Bose Chief Business Officer

Aniruddha holds an MBA with Distinction from Sa√Ød Business School, University of Oxford. He has 16 years of experience in the Investment Advisory space with institutions like Destimoney & Standard Chartered Bank. Aniruddha is a founding team member and has been instrumental in setting up & leading key business processes, strategies & systems for FinEdge.

Sir Gaurav Agarwal Co-Founder

Gaurav is a management graduate from Case Western Reserve University, Cleveland, with a major in marketing and strategy. With over 15 years of work experience, Gaurav has set up multiple e commerce companies and successfully managed large distribution businesses for ITC and Nokia.
